nodes.text: the U.S. has to win an overwhelming victory one that ends completely the current Baghdad regime. Only then will Washington have the free hand it wants to remake Iraq as well as the leverage with other governments in the region.
A stalemate or even  peaceful regime change  would undermine the U.S. ability to shape political outcomes in Iraq the first domino in the Bush vision.
If a stalemate or peaceful regime change would undermine the US ability to shape the political outcomes in Iraq it needs a quick and decisive war in order to allow it to remake Iraq
